description.value:
This intricately carved wooden staff is warm to the touch and thrums with inner energy. While wielding the staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to identify abjuration magic.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Shield]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Alarm], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gentle Landing]{Feather Fall}
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Environmental Endurance], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Resist Energy]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Alarm], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Rune Trap]{Glyph of Warding}
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Planar Tether]{Dimensional Anchor}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Resist Energy]
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Banishment], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Environmental Endurance]
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Repulsion]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
